mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bim_base..cinema (id, district_id, NAME, address, latitude, longitude, pos, rating, has_3d, has_imax, has_Wifi, has_Park, tel, route, id_maoyan, id_mtime, id_baidu ) VALUES (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{districtId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pos,jdbcType=OTHER}, #{rating,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{has3d,jdbcType=BIT}, #{hasImax,jdbcType=BIT}, #{hasWifi,jdbcType=BIT}, #{hasPark,jdbcType=BIT}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{route,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idMaoyan,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{idMtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{idBaidu,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bim_base..cinema SET district_id = #{districtId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pos = #{pos,jdbcType=OTHER}, rating = #{rating,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, has_3d = #{has3d,jdbcType=BIT}, has_imax = #{hasImax,jdbcType=BIT}, has_Wifi = #{hasWifi,jdbcType=BIT}, has_Park = #{hasPark,jdbcType=BIT}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, route = #{route,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_maoyan = #{idMaoyan,jdbcType=INTEGER}, id_mtime = #{idMtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, id_baidu = #{idBaidu,jdbcType=INTEGER} WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT id, district_id, name, address, latitude, longitude, pos, rating, has_3d, has_imax, has_Wifi, has_Park, tel, route, id_maoyan, id_mtime, id_baidu FROM bim_base..cinema WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT id, district_id, name, address, latitude, longitude, pos, rating, has_3d, has_imax, has_Wifi, has_Park, tel, route, id_maoyan, id_mtime, id_baidu FROM bim_base..cinema
